metadata.description: KCT Menswear actual price tiers from production Supabase data
metadata.source: KCT-DATA-MANIFEST.md Part 3.5 - Real pricing from 1,361 products

entry.description: Budget-friendly basics for students, first-time buyers, or value shoppers
entry.typical_customer: High school prom, college formal, budget-conscious

mid.description: Quality construction with modern features - KCT's sweet spot

premium.description: Luxury fabrics (velvet, sequin, jacquard) and standout styling

luxury.description: Designer-level pieces, European imports, statement tuxedos
luxury.typical_customer: Black tie event, high-end wedding, executive

accessory_rule.explanation: Never recommend a $129 shoe with a $119 suit - keep accessories under 25% of suit cost
